jobs.command: 0 1 * * * bash -c "bash -c 'cd data && export HOME=/app/data && source .profile.d/python.sh && python -m tasks.sync' && npm run db:seed:local:full"
0 2 * * * bash -c 'cd data && export HOME=/app/data && source .profile.d/python.sh && celery -A celery_app call tasks.check_website.queue_all && celery -A celery_app call tasks.check_dns.queue_all'
